summary: This demo add a castle on the top of a mountain in the sea north of Skyrim with quite a few features.
descriptionHtml:
This demo add a castle on the top of a mountain in the sea north of Skyrim.

Use the console command coc castle2 to access the castle,oh and carry a bit of money, you gonna have to hire the npcs.

I added placeholder VA as an optional file, it is all done by me so it ISN\'T professional so unless bad voice acting is better than no voice acting at all for you, don\'t use.


This is only a demo/beta, it is in no way finished and nothing is final. The main focus is on the features rather than the actual castle, so things such as location are very likely to be final.

Feel free to share constructive critism and report bugs.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Current Features:

-Hirable npcs through Lukas,the castle steward.
-Training dummies that will give you experience with two hander, one hander and 
bows.
-30+ guards that patrol your castle night and day ( half of them patrol at day and the other half a night) -You can also use 7 of those guards as followers.
-added a cook that offer you different meals almost every day (they are also different depending if you ask for a meal in the morning or later in the day.
-Cleaning ladies that will clean the 2 first floors for you and the third floor if you summon them to your chambers.
-2 bards who will sing and take requests (one inside and one outside).
-A blacksmith that sells you equipments.
-A stable boy who will sells you horses and dogs.
-Librarian who sells you books and spell tomes
-Teleports from and to the 5 mains cities of Skyrim.
-Ability to summon some of your servants to your bedchambers.
-Expert Trainers for 1handed,2handed and archery.
-Ability to place a shrine of your choice in the chapel.
-Bathing,Holy water and Clean hands buffs.
-Squire who can be your follower.
-3 merchants who sells their wares outside.
-Npcs awareness of you being their lord/lady (they will be custom voiced with dialog that will show you that they know who you are.

Rooms:
Storage room
Jail
Kitchen
Guard bedrooms
Throne Room
Library
Armory
Guest living room
Guest bedrooms
Personnal Living room
Personnal Bedroom
Bathhouse

Buildings:
Servant house
Blacksmith
Chapel
 

 What is left to do:
-Make you have to pay to unlock certains rooms.
-Quest and dungeons leading to the castle.
-Events: bandit attacks,parties to have with your skyrim friends, taking prisoners(with trials), visitor at the court.
-Add pro voice acting.
-Polishing.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirement:
Latest update. (1.8)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Install
Extract your files in the Skyrimfolder

Uninstall :
Remove Castle.esp and the bsa from your data folder.

*For the sound files, extract to your DATA folder
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
Oaristys and Tony67 for their modder\'s resources
Artisanix for the Paintings and Frames resources
Runspect for his/her modder resources
yourenotsupposedtobeinhere for the Rug Resource
Sulya Tamagen for the Tamagen Pillows
bfadragon for his/her food resources


To follow my work on skyrim or programming in general, follow http://www.facebook.com/RpgProjectOfSkyrim?fref=ts
author: littleork
